```{r setup}
library(carolinaKernels)
library(tidyverse)

plays <- PLAYS
pff <- PFFScoutingData

plays <- plays %>%
  left_join(
    pff %>%
      select(
        gameId,
        playId,
        snapDetail,
        kickDirectionIntended,
        kickDirectionActual,
        hangTime
        ),
    by = c("gameId","playId"),
    snapDetail = snapDetail
    )

plot_kick_playType(plays,"Punt")
plot_kick_result(plays,"Punt")
plot_results(plays,"Punt")
plot_kick_playResult(plays,"Punt")
plot_down_kick(plays,"Field Goal")
plot_team_yardage(plays,"Punt")
plot_hangTime(plays,"Punt")
plot_top_punters(plays,"Punt")
plot_top_kickers(plays,"Punt")
```
